javascriptConfig.javaScript: var savedData = document.getElementById('ketsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); let output = []; let comics = document.querySelectorAll('.list-item'); let dataList = []; comics.forEach(comic => { let img = comic.querySelector('.img-responsive').src; let title = comic.querySelector('.title a').innerText; let url = comic.querySelector('.title a').href; let genre = comic.querySelector('.genre').innerText; let updated = comic.querySelector('.updated').innerText; let chapters = comic.querySelector('.chapters').innerText; dataList.push({ 'image': { 'url': img, 'method': 'GET', 'headers': [] }, 'title': title, 'description': genre, 'field1': updated, 'field2': chapters, 'isChapter': false, 'link': { 'url': url, 'method': 'GET', 'headers': [] } }); }); output.push({ 'cellDesing': 'normal1', 'orientation': 'vertical', 'defaultLayout': 'wide', 'paging': 'leading', 'section': { 'sectionName': 'Latest Comics', 'separator': true }, 'data': dataList }); let mainPageObject = { 'request': { 'url': '', 'method': 'GET', 'headers': [] }, 'extra': {}, 'javascriptConfig': { 'removeJavascript': true, 'loadInWebView': false }, 'output': output }; savedData.innerHTML = JSON.stringify(mainPageObject);

var savedData = document.getElementById('ketsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); let output = []; let searchResults = document.querySelectorAll('.list-item'); let dataList = []; searchResults.forEach(item => { let img = item.querySelector('.img-responsive').src; let title = item.querySelector('.title a').innerText; let url = item.querySelector('.title a').href; let genre = item.querySelector('.genre').innerText; let updated = item.querySelector('.updated').innerText; let chapters = item.querySelector('.chapters').innerText; dataList.push({ 'image': { 'url': img, 'method': 'GET', 'headers': [] }, 'title': title, 'description': genre, 'field1': updated, 'field2': chapters, 'isChapter': false, 'link': { 'url': url, 'method': 'GET', 'headers': [] } }); }); output.push({ 'cellDesing': 'normal1', 'orientation': 'vertical', 'defaultLayout': 'wide', 'paging': 'leading', 'section': { 'sectionName': 'Search Results', 'separator': true }, 'data': dataList }); let searchPageObject = { 'request': { 'url': '', 'method': 'GET', 'headers': [] }, 'extra': {}, 'javascriptConfig': { 'removeJavascript': true, 'loadInWebView': false }, 'output': output }; savedData.innerHTML = JSON.stringify(searchPageObject);
